catalog_script_client.name: Get Employee Info and AutoFill

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_93265c191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbe3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee Termination">b7f598d51b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcb9f</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d93c28591b492050e7004229bc4bcb0d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get Employee Info and AutoFill</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }


    g_form.getReference('Person_Leaving', populateDeptDetails);
    //console.log("reqFor: "+ reqFor.sys_id);

    /*
    var reqForI = g_form.getValue('Person_Leaving');
    console.log('reqFor: ' + reqForI);
    //console.log('reqFor.company' + company);
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
    gr.addQuery('sys_id', reqForI);
    gr.query();
    var reqFor = gr.next();
    console.log('reqFor.company' + reqFor.company);
    */

    function populateDeptDetails(reqFor) {
        //ensure that a record exists, then set the value correctly and set permissions correctly
        //if no record exists, then empty the value correctly and set permissions correctly

        //autofill manager
        if (reqFor.manager != '') {
            g_form.setValue('employees_manager', reqFor.manager);
        }

        var company_not_blank = 'false';
        var ga = new GlideAjax('global.company_validation');
            ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'validateCompany'); ga.addParam('val1', reqFor.company); ga.getXML(function(response) {
                company_not_blank = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
				
				
				
                if (reqFor.company != '' && company_not_blank == 'true') {
                    //g_form.setValue('company', 'test company');
                    g_form.setValue('company', reqFor.company);
                    g_form.setReadOnly('company', true);
                    g_form.setMandatory('company', false);
                } else {
                    g_form.setValue('company', '');
                    g_form.setReadOnly('company', false);
                    g_form.setMandatory('company', true);
					
					
					
                }
            });


            //if company record is not empty


            //if location record is not empty
            if (reqFor.location != '') {
                g_form.setValue('location', reqFor.location);
                g_form.setReadOnly('location', true);
                g_form.setMandatory('location', false);
            } else {
                g_form.setValue('location', '');
                g_form.setReadOnly('location', false);
                g_form.setMandatory('location', true);
            }
        }
    }]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-06 14:33:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>93265c191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbe3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Employee Info and AutoFill</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Termination Process Core">c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_93265c191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbe3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 14:33:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
